page.description: Set the license keys for a TransForm account.

argument.name: licenseKeys
argument.description: A CRLF delimited list of license keys to set for an Account

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: countLicensesAdded
property.description: count of the number of license keys added to the account

section.title: Node
